title: Sweet-Spicy Salmon with Caramelised Onions
ingredients: ['1 1/2 teaspoons freshly ground pepper', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon dark brown sugar', 'pinch onion powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 (160g) salmon fillets', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 onion, finely chopped']
